tag_professor: Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: He is a great professor. I highly recommend his class. He has a sense of humor, which makes the class fun. The short stories he assigns are interesting to read. You can use his short stories to write a compare and contrast essay. He will sit down with you and explain what mistakes were made on the essay and how to fix it.

comments: he is the best professor I ever had. he explains everything students need clearly and in a better way. he loves to give quite many short stories which we students use to extracts ideas for our essays. also he is very fun lover and never stress students. if you want to do well in for year college take his class and learn a lot. good luck.

If you want an A you have got to work hard. He is the best english professor I\'ve ever had. Wish he was teaching EN101
